comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of desk-lamps to be made and y be the number of night-lamps to be made.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x \geq 30",
        "y \geq 50",
        "x \leq 150",
        "y \leq 180",
        "x + y \geq 100"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize profit: Maximize 5x + 8y"
}
